text: Valence is a city in the south of France, along the Rhône river. It is in the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region in the Drôme department in France. Kiosque_2004-09-18_009.jpg MaisonDrapier-Valence.jpg Valence-Fontaine.jpg Côte_des_chapeliers.JPG Côte_sous_la_cathédrale.JPG ==Sister cities== Valence is twinned with: * Asti, Italy, since 1966 * Biberach an der Riss, Germany, since 1967 * Clacton-on-Sea, United Kingdom, since 1969 * Ijevan, Armenia, since 1996 * Gedera, Israel, since 1997 Category:Communes in Drôme Category:Departmental capitals in France
title: Valence, Drôme
